name: Rock Paper Scissors Simulator 2007
description:
We made Rock-Paper-Scissors-Shoot FUN! We guarantee with our new game you will NEVER LOSE ONCE! It's that crazy. This simulator brings all the factors of playing rock-paper-scissors, onto the screen!
